title: Can't Connect to the game
body:
I just got into an aram lobby, and all was well and good. Lobby timer ticks down to 0, and then says Game is ready, or whatever it is, and then nothing. Screen didnt minimise and go into loading screen or anything. I though, oh well, close client, reopen, relog, and then reconnect. Nope. Comes up with the Game Abandoned - You have a left a game in progress. Please reconnect to the game, and the orange reocnnect button. If i click on the button, nothing happens.

Should i just repair game files, and hope i dont cop an afk report?

replies.body: i had the same thing in my ranked game then i cannot connect the orange reconnect button isnt working.

Happening to me too. Stuck in lobby for ranked. Restarted game and cleared logs folder. Clicking reconnect button on restart does not work.

Timmeh don't bother repairing the issue isn't with your game.

Riot please fix this
Haha if only one of us could load in we could solo win the game haha
